name: Deepsight
description: Your senses are especially keen in the utter darkness.
benefit: Your darkvision has a range of 120 feet.
mythicDescription: Your sharp eyes can penetrate deeper into the darkness, revealing more to you.
mythicBenefit: The range of your darkvision increases by 10 feet per tier.
description_zh: 你的感官在完全的黑暗中格外敏锐。
benefit_zh:
你的黑暗视觉提升至120尺。

通常状况：黑暗视觉通常只有60尺或90尺。
